generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif}.header{display:grid;grid-template-columns:20% 50% auto}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.header{grid-template-columns:1fr}}@media print,screen and (min-width:769px){.header{grid-template-columns:1fr}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.header{grid-template-columns:24% 50% auto}}.header__title{display:flex;align-items:center;position:relative;padding-left:1.6rem;min-height:180px;text-transform:uppercase}.header__title:before{content:"";position:absolute;height:8px;width:calc(100% - 1.6rem);background-color:#2eaeff;top:60%}.header__image img{width:100%;height:100%}.header__desc{display:flex;align-items:center;text-align:center;min-height:180px;padding:1.6rem;background-color:#1a2339;color:#fff}.product{display:grid}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.product{grid-template-columns:1fr}}@media print,screen and (min-width:769px){.product{grid-template-columns:1fr}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.product{grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr)}}.product__section{display:flex;padding:1.6rem}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.product__section{flex-direction:column}}@media print,screen and (min-width:769px){.product__section{flex-direction:row}}@media screen and (min-width:1024px){.product__section{flex-direction:row}}.product__section:nth-child(odd){background-color:#fbf6f4}.product__ingredients{flex-basis:50%;margin-right:32px}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.product__ingredients{padding-bottom:40px}}.product__nutritional{flex-basis:50%}table{font-family:arial,sans-serif;border-collapse:collapse;width:100%;white-space:nowrap;border:1px solid #000}@media screen and (max-width:768px){table{white-space:normal}}thead{border-bottom:1px solid #000}tbody tr td{border-right:1px solid #000;padding:2px 8px}tbody tr td:not(:first-child){text-align:center}td,th{text-align:left;padding:8px}.nutritional__title{text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.2rem;font-size:.85rem;text-align:center}.nutritional__desc{font-size:.65rem;font-weight:600;vertical-align:bottom}.nutritional__desc:nth-child(n+2){text-align:center}.nutritional__head{font-family:Sanchez,sans-serif}.nutritional__body{font-size:.65rem}.ingredients__title{font-family:Raleway,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;padding-bottom:16px;font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:700}.ingredients__title:nth-child(odd){color:#2eaeff}.ingredients__title:nth-child(2n){color:#fd4a41}.ingredients__desc{line-height:2rem;font-weight:500}.ingredients__desc span{font-weight:700}.nutritional__indent{text-indent:16px}.nav{display:flex;background-color:#fa423b;align-items:center;position:relative;z-index:1;flex-wrap:wrap}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.nav{flex-direction:column}}.nav__logo{object-fit:contain;margin-right:auto}.nav__item{text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:900;letter-spacing:2px;color:#fff;text-decoration:none;padding:.6rem}.nav__item:hover{color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.4)}
